*Alex misrepresents [https://www.wusa9.com/article/news/verify/verify-why-a-face-mask-box-says-it-provides-no-protection-to-the-wearer/507-d5070a18-0146-4ef9-9d22-afe9fa7759a0 a warning on the back of a box of masks] that he saw in a meme

*[https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/databriefs/db395-H.pdf CDC data] on 2019 US deaths
*[https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/70/wr/mm7014e1.htm Provisional CDC data] on 2020 US deaths

*Alex misrepresents [https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/atlanta-mom-files-complaint-alleging-daughter-s-grade-school-segregated-n1276584 a story about allegations of segregation] in an Atlanta elementary school

*The FDA [https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2018/09/28/2018-21210/richard-m-fleming-denial-of-hearing-final-debarment-order disbarred Fleming in 2018]
